title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication (pages, emails)

tosdr.case: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
tosdr.tldr: From Cengage Privacy Notice, 5. Cookies and Other Data Collection Technologies, it states that, "Pixel tags and web beacons are tiny graphic images placed on website pages or in our emails that allow us to determine whether you have performed a specific action. When you access these pages or open or click an email, the pixel tags and web beacons generate a notice of that action. These tools allow us to measure response to our communications and improve our web pages and promotions. "
